dormant.translation[0].definitions[0].de: not active or not growing at the present time but able to be active later
dormant.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The seeds remain dormant until the spring.
dormant.translation[1].definitions[0].de: something that is dormant has not been active for a long time, although it may become active in the future
dormant.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The project lay dormant for two years until we found a co-sponsor.
Someone tampered with IBM systems by planting a dormant bug due to wipe out whole data banks on Friday 13th.
